https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/igJr9FC2lKJ00Ek2TheB1kVLEie.jpg Lucas Snow was buried alive and has lost 3 days of his life. His best friend is murdered and the two top crime bosses are hunting him down as well as the police. Will he find out who set him up? 3 Days Gone
